mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mom_matching (mathcing_no, mathcing_date, ground_no, reward_no, matching_status_condition, matching_title )VALUES( #{mathcing_no}, #{mathcing_date}, #{ground_no}, #{reward_no}, #{matching_status_condition}, #{matching_title} )
mapper.select: SELECT mathcing_no, mathcing_date, ground_no, reward_no, matching_status_condition, matching_title FROM mom_matching
